page.title: 10Walks around Wootton
page.content: Go to West End across the fields over the A34.Go along the south end of the quarry westward to the B4437 and Woodleys Cottages.Then turn left and walk back via the road and the Duke of Marlborough public house to the village. From the village centre go eastwards along Milford lane down to and over Milford Bridge. Up through the wood to the concrete road. Then just south of the Cottages going eastwards is a green lane known as Slough lane.Only a few yards into the lane fork left across the field to the right of the hand pump in the distance.At Dornford Lane turn right (South) towards Slough Lane and back to the start.
